afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.informationfunctions.interfaces

Interface IERTScore<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type used to identify features.
    C - Type of content present in the ITrainingPoint.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralizedNormalizedShannonEntropy, RelativeVarianceReduction

    public interface IERTScore<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface for objects used to calculate the score of a split.

        Return the score of the split on the given set.
        Type Parameters:
